Medieval set

20 Oct 2018 | blender models set

Set of 40 textured 3D models in medieval style.

Textures for Unity:

  1. AlbedoTransparency 
  2. MetallicSmoothness 
  3. Normal

Content:

  1. Anvil 
  2. Apple 
  3. Barrel
  4. Bench 
  5. Big battleaxe
  6. Blacksmiths hammer
  7. Blacksmiths hammer-beak 
  8. Blacksmiths sledgehammer 
  9. Box 
  10. Bucket 
  11. Canopy
  12. Cart 
  13. Chair 
  14. Chest
  15. Cutting pliers
  16. Hatchet 
  17. Ingot #1 
  18. Ingot #2 
  19. Ingot #3 
  20. Ingot #4 
  21. Lucerne hammer 
  22. Pliers 
  23. Runed hammer 
  24. Sax 
  25. Scramasax 
  26. Shield 
  27. Shield of the viking #1 
  28. Shield of the viking #2 
  29. Shield of the viking #3 
  30. Shield of the viking #4 
  31. Shovel 
  32. Store 
  33. Stump 
  34. Sword #1
  35. Sword of the Englishman 
  36. Sword of the Viking 
  37. Table 
  38. Torch 
  39. Wall 
  40. Well 

LODs:
All models have lods (2-3 levels).
